meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or based on theory.
meanings.sent1: The theoretic explanation helped us understand the concept better.
meanings.sent2: Her approach was more theoretic than practical in nature.
meanings.sent3: He had a theoretic idea to build a time machine out of cardboard boxes.
meanings.sent4: The theoretic framework of the research was like a roadmap guiding the study.
meanings.sent5: The theoretic model painted a vivid picture of the complex system.

meanings.definition: Speculative or hypothetical; not practical or applied.
meanings.sent1: The theoretic scenario presented in the meeting was intriguing.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed discussing theoretic concepts with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The theoretic notion of flying pigs made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His theoretic ideas were like colorful balloons floating in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The theoretic approach added a touch of magic to the project.
